patthana8.53:4.1: Nakilesañceva naasaṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṃkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.53:5.1: Naasaṃkilesikañceva nano ca kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkilesiko ceva nano ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.53:6.1: Nakilesañceva naasaṃkilesikañca naasaṃkilesikañceva nano ca kilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṃkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
